definition: to exhaust/to use up/to deplete/to drain
to waste/to spend/to consume/to squander/news/(coll.) to delay/to dilly-dally
to use up/to exhaust/to end/to finish/to the utmost/exhausted/finished/to the limit (of sth)/all/entirely
to the greatest extent/(when used before a noun of location) furthest or extreme/to be within the limits of/to give priority to

sentences.english: Did they deplete the bamboo resources themselves?
sentences.chinese: 是巨猿耗尽竹资源的吗？

sentences.english: Retirement accounts and savings, they say, have been drained to pay legal fees.
sentences.chinese: 用来支付诉讼费用的退休金账户和储蓄已被耗尽。

sentences.english: Many more exhausted their last breath just as they reached the abatis.
sentences.chinese: 更多的人冲到鹿砦跟前已耗尽最后一丝气力。

sentences.english: They cancel out the benefits of modernization. They break the bank.
sentences.chinese: 它们将抵消现代化的益处，并将耗尽资财。

sentences.english: When I am burned out infuse me with the light of the Holy Spirt.
sentences.chinese: 当我耗尽时，以圣灵之光激励我。

sentences.english: Thy dial how thy precious minutes waste;
sentences.chinese: 时光如何耗尽你的珍贵华年。

sentences.english: Club of Rome estimated that oil would run out of in 1992.
sentences.chinese: 罗马俱乐部曾估计一九九二年石油将耗尽。

sentences.english: Adrenaline depletes over time when not engaging in combat.
sentences.chinese: 当没有处于战斗状态时，怒气会随着时间而耗尽。

sentences.english: These foothills have been farmed out with tobacco.
sentences.chinese: 这些丘陵地由于专种烟草而耗尽了地力。

sentences.english: A formula of depletion layer width is also deduced.
sentences.chinese: 也导出了两方法的耗尽层宽度公式。

sentences.english: This footprint damages and depletes almost everything in its path.
sentences.chinese: 这些足迹所到之处破坏并耗尽了几乎一切资源。

sentences.english: The seed consumed, cravings no more arise.
He spent all his energy climbing up the hill.
sentences.chinese: 他耗尽全身气力爬上了山顶。

sentences.english: But when allowed to simmer , it depletes energy that could be used to improve your life.
sentences.chinese: 但当允许发酵，耗尽精力，它可以用来改善你的生活。

sentences.english: They feel as if they have expended all their energy and all they get in return is a sense of emptiness.
sentences.chinese: 他们觉得似乎耗尽了所有精力，换来的只有空虚感。

sentences.english: The Second World War bled white many countries in Europe.
sentences.chinese: 第二次世界大战耗尽了许多欧洲国家的财力物力。

definition: spirit weary, strength exhausted (idiom); spent/drained/washed out
body weary, strength exhausted (idiom); extremely tired/spent
